text: KXAD-LD is a digital low-powered television station that is licensed to and located in Amarillo, Texas. It is a Rev'n affiliate owned by Mako Communications. The station transmits its digital signal on UHF channel 51.Digital TV Market Listing for KXAD-LD ==References== ==External links== * Category:Digital low-power television stations XAD-LD Category:Television channels and stations established in 2009 Category:2009 establishments in Texas
title: KXAD-LD
